title: WADA Proposer Workshops
description: Many African entrepreneurs are unaware of the Project Catalyst's funding campaigns and the community's encouragement of African proposals.
solution: 2-Day Virtual and in-person event (hosted at local WADA Hubs) with guest speakers, project proposals, interviews, live Q&A (multi-lingual).
experience: WADA Team: multilingual developers/trainers, event coordinators, marketing, and business experts.
